snippet: Marvin Austin, an injury-plagued defensive tackle drafted in the second round in 2011, could play his first regular-season N.F.L. game on Sunday.
abstract: New York Giants defensive tackle Marvin Austin, drafted in 2011 but plagued by injuries, could play his first regular-season game in Week 2 against Tampa Bay.
lead_paragraph: Marvin Austin, an injury-plagued defensive tackle drafted in the second round in 2011, could play his first regular-season N.F.L. game on Sunday.

headline.seo: For Giants’ Marvin Austin, the Sitting and Fretting Could Be Over
headline.main: For a 2011 Draft Pick, the Sitting and Fretting Could Finally Be Over
headline.print_headline: For a 2011 Draft Pick, the Sitting and Fretting Could Finally Be Over
